library.description: Provides a means to visually connect DOM elements. Runs on jQuery, MooTools or YUI3, on all browsers from IE6 and up.
library.name: jsPlumb

library.description: The Get Utility makes it easy to dynamically load JavaScript and CSS resources and be notified when they've finished loading. Get is used internally by the YUI Loader to load YUI modules and by the JSONP module to make JSONP requests. The Get Utility is transactional in nature and is capable of loading multiple resources either serially or in parallel.
library.name: YUI 3: Get

library.description: Alloy is a UI framework built on top of YUI3 that provides a simple API for building high scalable applications.
library.name: AlloyUI

library.description:
The event-touch module extends the whitelist of DOM events to include the native touch and gesture events and adds relevant information to event facades.

The event-move module adds a set of abstract events that adapt to the client environment to handle either touch or mouse input.

The event-flick module adds a "flick" event on top of the gesture abstraction layer to capture a user flicking an element with mouse or finger.

The event-gestures module is a rollup of these three, but will potentially roll in more gesture based events in the future.
library.name: YUI Touch Events and Abstractions

library.description: A browser extension that takes JavaScript frameworks and makes their internals visible, including views, models, class names, and more.
library.name: Illuminations for Developers

library.description: The Rich Text Editor is a UI control that replaces a standard HTML textarea; it allows for the rich formatting of text content, including common structural treatments like lists, formatting treatments like bold and italic text, and drag-and-drop inclusion and sizing of images. The Rich Text Editor's toolbar is extensible via a plugin architecture so that advanced implementations can achieve a high degree of customization.
library.name: YUI 2: Rich Text Editor

library.description: JavaScript framework that makes building rich web applications easy. It strikes a balance between ease of use, safety, speed, flexibility.
library.name: CanJS
